project.title: Too Many Bears
project.description:
!format **Too Many Bears**, a game about battling an invasion of mech-piloting cats with your ever-growing supply of explosive bears, was my entry to the 40th Ludum Dare game jam, and was made completely solo in just three days.
My first ever submission to a public, multiple-day-long jam, the game was very well received, placing 45th among over a thousand 72-hour entrants with an outstanding 16th place in graphics.
project.feature: Skill/Ability tree system with difficulty scaling
